response.original_title: Urban Warfare Vol. 1 - Gang Fights Caught On Tape
response.overview: Take a journey into some of the most dangerous hoods in America and witness first-hand the largest collection of real street fghts and shocking gang violence ever assembled on a single DVD. Never before seen footage of convicts, gangsters, pimps, thugs and killers battling each other in the streets. You'll see crowbar attacks, police evidence assault videos, 1 blow KO's, ghetto girl fights, lynch mobs, drug dealers, race wars, vicious head-butts, convulsing bodies, and some of the scariest beatdowns ever caught on tape. This is the graphic truth about the  violent world in which we live.
response.title: Urban Warfare Vol. 1 - Gang Fights Caught On Tape
